perhaps.descricaoIngles: Used to express uncertainty or possibility, when one does not wish to be too definite or assertive in the expression of an opinion, when making a polite request, offer, or suggestion. (adverb)
perhaps.descricaoPortugues: Indica possibilidade, mas não certeza. Sinônimos: acaso, quiçá, porventura.

actually.descricaoIngles: As the truth or facts of a situation; really. Used to emphasize that something someone has said or done is surprising. (adverb)
actually.descricaoPortugues: É usada em uma afirmação que não é falsa, mas em que se oculta alguma informação.

push.descricaoIngles: Exert force on (someone or something), typically with one's hand, in order to move them away from oneself or the origin of the force. (verb)
push.descricaoPortugues: Impulsionar com força, impelir com vigor, empuxar. Dar encontrões em.

borrow.descricaoIngles: Take and use (something that belongs to someone else) with the intention of returning it. (verb)
borrow.descricaoPortugues: Pegar algo emprestado de alguém, com a intenção de devolvê-lo ao dono.

although.descricaoIngles: In spite of the fact that; even though; however; but. (conjunction)
although.descricaoPortugues: Enquanto, mesmo que, apesar de que, ainda que.

traffic.descricaoIngles: Vehicles moving on a road or public highway. (noun)

awful.descricaoIngles: Very bad or unpleasant. Used to emphasize the extent of something, especially something unpleasant or negative. (adjective)
awful.descricaoPortugues: Adjetivo usado para algo muito ruim ou desagradável; horroroso, péssimo.

principal.descricaoIngles: The person with the highest authority or most important position in an organization, institution, or group. (noun)
principal.descricaoPortugues: Aquele que dirige ou orienta; dirigente, gestor. Aquele que ocupa o cargo mais alto numa administração.

rug.descricaoIngles: A floor covering of thick woven material or animal skin, typically not extending over the entire floor. (noun)
rug.descricaoPortugues: Revestimento feito de algum material (normalmente tecido) para revestir pisos.

clover.descricaoIngles: A herbaceous plant of the pea family that has dense, globular flower heads, and leaves that are typically three-lobed. It is an important and widely grown fodder and rotational crop. (noun)
clover.descricaoPortugues: Design. comum a diversas plantas que têm folhas compostas por três folíolos; trifólio.
